The Law of Conservation of Energy: This law states that energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed from one form to another. In my universe, I would ensure that this law is followed strictly to maintain a balance between the various forms of energy present in the universe.
The Law of Attraction: This law states that like attracts like. In my universe, I would ensure that this law is followed to promote harmony and cooperation among all living beings.

The Law of Cause and Effect: This law states that every action has an equal and opposite reaction. In my universe, I would ensure that this law is followed to prevent any negative consequences from actions taken by individuals or groups.

The Law of Universal Gravitation: This law states that every object in the universe is attracted to every other object with a force proportional to their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them. In my universe, I would ensure that this law is followed to maintain the stability of celestial bodies.

The Law of Non-Interference: This law states that entities in different universes should not interfere with each other's affairs. In my universe, I would ensure that this law is followed to prevent any unwanted interference from other universes.
